Model.Player

Class HumanPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Player.Player
      • Model.Player.HumanPlayer

  • public class HumanPlayer
extends Player
    This class represents a player controlled by an actual person. Created by Martijn on 20-1-2016.
